metadata.description: Plugin marketplace for Safe-wallet development tools

plugins.name: safe-engineering
plugins.description: AI-powered development tools for the Safe-wallet monorepo. Specialized agents for TypeScript/React/Next.js code review, feature architecture validation, multi-chain patterns, Redux store design, and Safe SDK integration. Includes team config distribution with /safe:config. Based on compound-engineering by Kieran Klaassen (EveryInc). Includes 22 specialized agents, 15 commands, and 12 skills.
